definitions.definition: A light chip; a chipped pass or shot
To play a soft drop shot.
To chip lightly, to play a light chip shot.
definitions.example: The forward dinked the ball over the goalkeeper to score his first goal of the season.

definitions.definition: A ride on the crossbar or handlebars of a bicycle.
definitions.example: I gave him a dink on my bike.

definitions.definition: To carry someone on a pushbike: behind, on the crossbar or on the handlebar.
Double Income No Kids - a childless couple with two jobs.
A foolish person, a despised person.
